Fortune Teller Wrist Ribbons
Ruban de poignet de la voyante
Wahrsagerinnen-Armbänder

占い師のリストリボン（女性用）
Fortune Teller Wrist Ribbons (Women)

Fortune Teller Wrist Ribbons (Women)
Fortune Teller Wrist Ribbons (Women)
Fortune Teller Wrist Ribbons
kDesc
Cross her palm with silver and she'll tell you your fortune… Or maybe she's just made hers. [#Legal]
Placez de l'argent sur la paume de sa main et elle vous dira votre bonne fortune… à moins qu'elle vienne de faire la sienne. [#Legal]
Fülle ihre Hände mit Silber und sie wird dir deine Zukunft voraussagen... oder sich vielleicht eher ihre eigene sichern. [#Legal]
Metti una moneta nel palmo della sua mano e ti leggerà il futuro... o forse ci ha solo guadagnato. [#Legal]
Colócale un poco de plata en la mano y te leerá el futuro... O puede que solo se labre el suyo. [#Legal]
占い師に硬貨を支払えばあなたの運命（フォーチュン）を教えてくれるでしょう。ただし、彼女が財産（フォーチュン）を成すだけに終わるかもしれませんが。 [#Legal]
Cross her palm with silver and she'll tell you your fortune… Or maybe she's just made hers. [#Legal]
Cross her palm with silver and she'll tell you your fortune… Or maybe she's just made hers. [#Legal]
Cross her palm with silver and she'll tell you your fortune… Or maybe she's just made hers. [#Legal]
Cross her palm with silver and she'll tell you your fortune… Or maybe she's just made hers. [#Legal]
